title: FoodApe
description: Led a 5-member team to build a food-ordering app for 30,000+ VIT-AP students.
Built scalable architecture, boosting performance by 30% and reducing latency by 25%.
Developed APIs with 20% faster response and 40% higher cache hits.
Integrated ML-based recommendations to enhance user experience.

title: StayHub
description: Implemented secure authentication using cookies and salting for reliable user access control.
Integrated Mapbox API for accurate location services, improving user experience and convenience.
Built RESTful APIs for accounts, orders, and payments, reducing response times by 10% and boosting cache hit rate by 25%.

title: Age Detection Using CNN
description: Built an age detection CNN ensemble model with 80% prediction accuracy.
Trained the model on UTKFace and Facial Age datasets over 60 epochs.
Used softmax activation for multi-class age classification.

title: MAYHEM
description: Developed a user interface for inputting and managing daily journal entries.
Integrated AI to analyze content, detect emotional patterns, and provide mental health insights.
Designed an interactive dashboard with visualizations to track emotional well-being over time.

title: FFCS on The Go
description: Streamlined course registration for 120,000+ VIT students each semester.
Reduced average course selection time by 40% through a guided flow and faster UI.
Improved user satisfaction by 70%, based on survey feedback.
